actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, relating to the control of aircraft noise, in order to prohibit any special consideration for commercial supersonic aircraft.

summary.text: Provides that nothing in the Federal Aviation Act shall authorize any exemption or special consideration for compliance by civil supersonic aircraft with regulations protecting the public from aircraft noise and sonic boom.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 611 of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, relating to the control of aircraft noise, in order to prohibit any special consideration for commercial supersonic aircraft.
